content: Hi I was wondering if there was some form of machine readable version of https://www.hl7.org/fhir/terminologies-systems.html?
which kind of information are you wanting to read?
Just a mapping of SOURCE to URI to OID
That would be NamingSystem. I think there's an intention to do this at some point, but probably don't have time to do it for R4. If you like, you could submit a change request.
